name: SpectroPhobia
description:
Embark on a chilling journey in "SpectroPhobia" a spine-tingling horror adventure where your wits and nerves will be put to the ultimate test. Trapped within the confines of an abandoned mansion, you must navigate its shadowy corridors, unravel its sinister secrets, and escape before it's too late.

As darkness envelopes every corner, your only hope lies in uncovering hidden objects, solving perplexing puzzles, and evading the clutches of a malevolent entity that stalks the halls. With every step, the mansion's haunting past unravels, revealing the harrowing truth behind its forsaken walls.

With three possible escape routes, your survival depends on choosing wisely and staying one step ahead of the unseen terror that dwells within. Can you survive the night and outsmart the darkness before it claims you?
